description:
These lightweight, alloy-framed snowshoes are perfect for fitness-oriented hikers looking to get their outdoor fix through the winter months. The polymer decking material sheds snow easily and provides flotation in soft snow, while the intuitive harness features glove-friendly ratchet buckles that let you dial in the fit. When things turn icy, carbon steel crampons provide grip exactly where you need it.

  • Small diameter 6061 alloy frame provides structure and support with minimal weight
  • Durable polymer deck sheds snow and provides flotation
  • Riveted assembly for durable, snag-free performance
  • Comfortable harness uses ratchet buckle fasteners for a fine-tuned fit
  • Ratchets are glove-friendly and tested down to -40°C
  • Free flexing pivot uses doubled 30mm rubber straps for a robust and comfortable suspension
  • Carbon steel crampons provide reliable traction on icy trails
  • Streamlined shape and upswept toe for ergonomic walking on trails and in powder snow
name: Louis Garneau Nordik 1 Snowshoes - Unisex
